sentences.en: A balcony overhangs the door below it.
sentences.cn: 阳台悬于其下方的楼门之上.

sentences.en: A double room with a balcony overlooking the sea had been reserved for him.
sentences.cn: 特地为他预留了一间带阳台的海景双人房。

sentences.en: All rooms have a balcony or terrace.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都有阳台或露台。

sentences.en: Chris unhooked the shutters and went out on the balcony.
sentences.cn: 克里斯拉开百叶窗，走到了阳台上。

sentences.en: Has your flat got a balcony?
He stood at a balcony that projects over the entrance.
sentences.cn: 他站在入口上面突出的阳台上.

sentences.en: He walked out on to the balcony where he rested his arms on the railing.
sentences.cn: 他走上阳台，把胳膊搭在栏杆上。

sentences.en: He was watching a performance from the balcony.
sentences.cn: 他正在从楼厅上看电影.

sentences.en: Our garden is overlooked from the neighbour's balcony.
sentences.cn: 从邻居的阳台居高临下可以俯视我家的花园.

sentences.en: The balcony was closed with bars.
The manager of that theatre created a dangerous situation by allowing people to overcrowd the balcony.
sentences.cn: 那家剧场的经理让过多的人拥挤在楼厅里,造成了一种危险的情形.

sentences.en: There was a flurry of activity as the film star appeared on the balcony.
sentences.cn: 那名影星在阳台上一露面就引发了一阵骚动.

sentences.en: There were glass doors leading on to this balcony.
sentences.cn: 有玻璃门通到这个阳台。

sentences.en: There were tubs of flowers on the balcony.
Vivid red and pink geraniums cascade over my balcony.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的红色和粉色的天竺葵从我家的阳台上直挂下去。

sentences.en: You can see the sea from our balcony.
sentences.cn: 你从我们的阳台上就能看见大海.

trans.tran_en: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level
